passages.text:
[[(TalkToLogar)]]
[[(HookBreaksEvent)]]
Sequence:
None
passages.name: Begin

passages.text:
[[(IntroLogar)]]
Sequence:
None()
Conditions:
Variable["Story_Timeline_RiceAndFish"] == 0 and
Variable["CurrentAction_TalkingToLogar"] == true
passages.name: (TalkToLogar)

passages.text:
(set: $Story_Timeline_RiceAndFish = $Story_Timeline_RiceAndFish + 1, $Story_Variable_RiceAndFish_PissedOffLogar = false, $Emotion_Logar = -3, $Story_Variable_RiceAndFish_TalkedToLogar)
Huh? Whatever you want, I don't have it.

[[Tight lines, warm breezes, calm sky, it is truly like a dream, is it not?->Intro_Mag]]
[[Please spare some time, I just want to ask you some questions ->Intro_OrpMar]]
[[....Fine. I don't need your help anyway.->Intro_WanWor]]

links.name: Tight lines, warm breezes, calm sky, it is truly like a dream, is it not?
Please spare some time, I just want to ask you some questions
....Fine. I don't need your help anyway.

passages.name: (IntroLogar)

passages.text:
(set: $ArcheType_Magician = $ArcheType_Magician + 1, $Emotion_Logar = $Emotion_Logar + 1)
[[(Intro_Mag_Res)]]
Sequence:
None()
passages.name: Intro_Mag

passages.text:
(set: $ArcheType_Orphan = $ArcheType_Orphan + 1, $ArcheType_Matyr = $ArcheType_Matyr + 1, $Emotion_Logar = $Emotion_Logar + 1)
[[(Intro_OrpMar_Res)]]
Sequence:
None()
passages.name: Intro_OrpMar

passages.text:
(set: $ArcheType_Wanderer = $ArcheType_Wanderer + 1, $ArcheType_Warrior = $ArcheType_Warrior + 1, $Story_Variable_RiceAndFish_PissedOffLogar = true, $Emotion_Logar = $Emotion_Logar - 1)
[[(Intro_WanWor_Res)]]
Sequence:
None()
passages.name: Intro_WanWor

passages.text:
It is; you seem to value serenity. Yet, you disturb it.

[[It is so that I want to know more about you. One who understands this comfort.->Intro_Logar_Interested]]
[[My Koa breaks but I must endure for I need to know more about you.->Intro_Logar_Interested]]

links.name: It is so that I want to know more about you. One who understands this comfort.
My Koa breaks but I must endure for I need to know more about you.

passages.name: (Intro_Mag_Res)

passages.text:
Hmmm, I'll help, but you will leave me be after we're done.
[[Apologize for disturbing your peace. I promised to restore it after.->Intro_Logar_Agree_Martyr]]
[[Why you must be so hard, I desire to be friend with you->Intro_Logar_Agree_Orphan]]
[[Yes, I will leave after.->Intro_Logar_Interested]]

links.name: Apologize for disturbing your peace. I promised to restore it after.
Why you must be so hard, I desire to be friend with you

passages.name: (Intro_OrpMar_Res)

passages.text: And don't come back.
passages.name: (Intro_WanWor_Res)

passages.text:
I am Logar, a simple fisherman that enjoys his peace.
That is all.
[[(QuestionHub)]]
passages.name: Intro_Logar_Interested

passages.text:
(set: $ArcheType_Matyr = $ArcheType_Matyr + 1)
Keep your words, stranger.
[[I will ->Intro_Logar_Interested]]
[[On My Koa, I promise ->Intro_Logar_Interested]]

Sequence:
None()
passages.name: Intro_Logar_Agree_Martyr

passages.text:
(set: $ArcheType_Orphan = $ArcheType_Orphan + 1, $Story_Variable_RiceAndFish_PissedOffLogar = true, $Emotion_Logar = $Emotion_Logar - 3)
Friend ? I don't need any, I just want to be alone.
[[(Intro_Logar_Agree_Orphan_2)]]
passages.name: Intro_Logar_Agree_Orphan

passages.text: You know what, if that is your goal than we are done. Goodbye.
passages.name: (Intro_Logar_Agree_Orphan_2)

passages.text:
Anything else you need from me?

[[Who you used to be in The Kasi->PastLogar]]

[[Where are we? It seems that I'm somewhat lost.->WhereLogar]]

[[What happened for you to drown yourself in this tranquil place, alone.->WhatLogar]]

[[That is all I need to know, your help is much appreciated->DoneIntro]]

links.name: Who you used to be in The Kasi
Where are we? It seems that I'm somewhat lost.
What happened for you to drown yourself in this tranquil place, alone.
That is all I need to know, your help is much appreciated

passages.name: (QuestionHub)

passages.text:
I used to be a Yosha under The Kasi. To inspect and record everything that happened was my role.

[[Respectable Yosha!.->(QuestionHub)]]
[[I see.->(QuestionHub)]]
passages.name: PastLogar

passages.text:
We are on the western side of The Unka($VocalUnka), on the Ikta Ashim($VolcaIktaAshim). The forest around us is called the Dana Moir($VolcaDanaMoir)
[[(WhereLogar_Continue)]]
passages.name: WhereLogar

passages.text:
It's a long story which the more I tell you, the longer my peace is broken. However, I can tell you that it was because of all the complaining and nagging. 

[[(QuestionHub)]]
passages.name: WhatLogar

passages.text:
Now leave me be. Restore my peace.

[[I shall do so, another time Logar.->DoneIntro_Mag]]
[[Enjoy your peace, Logar.->DoneIntro_Mar]]
[[Goodbye.->DoneIntro_Neu]]

links.name: I shall do so, another time Logar.

passages.name: DoneIntro

passages.text:
Though I am not part of any tribes, I am known as a H'inja($VolcaHinja).

[[These names you spoke up, I do not understand. -> WhereLogar_Names]]

[[I wish to know more about these names. -> WhereLogar_Names]]

[[I've never heard of them before. -> WhereLogar_Names]]

links.name: These names you spoke up, I do not understand.
I wish to know more about these names.
I've never heard of them before.

passages.name: (WhereLogar_Continue)

passages.text:
Hmm, you must be a Junra then. These events were so big in the past that it is the only explanation.
[[(WhereLogar_Names_QuestionHub)]]
passages.name: WhereLogar_Names

passages.text:
(set: $VolcaUnka = "The Great Divide")
I'll expand your knowledge furthermore, Junra. The Unka means The Great Divide.

[[((WhereLogar_Names_QuestionHub_Before))]]
passages.name: (WhereLogar_Names_QuestionHub)

passages.text:
What other names don't you know ?.

[[Dana Moir ?->Explain_DanaMoir]]
[[Ikta ashim ?->Explain_IktaAshim]]
[[H'inja ?->Explain_Hinja]]
[[That is all, Logar->(QuestionHub)]]
passages.name: ((WhereLogar_Names_QuestionHub_Actual))

passages.text:
(set: $VolcaDanaMoir  = "The Calm Forest", $Emotion_Logar = $Emotion_Logar - 1)
Dana Moir means the Calm Forest since we H'inja($VolcaHinja) wants to live alone and do our own thing. Thus, peace is maintained... until you show up.

[[((WhereLogar_Names_QuestionHub_Actual))]]
passages.name: Explain_DanaMoir

passages.text:
(set: $VolcaIktaAshim  = "The Northen Part")
Ikta Ashim means The Northern Part. After the Unka($VocalUnka) happened, it split the whole land and the western side of it into two.

[[((WhereLogar_Names_QuestionHub_Actual))]]
passages.name: Explain_IktaAshim

passages.text:
(set: $VolcaHinja = "The Different One")
The people called us H'inja, the different one. We do not belong in any group or tribe. We only desire to be independent of all.

[[((WhereLogar_Names_QuestionHub_Actual))]]
passages.name: Explain_Hinja

passages.text:
(set: $ArcheType_Magician = $ArcheType_Magician + 1, $Emotion_Logar = $Emotion_Logar + 1)

Sequence:
None()

passages.text:
(set: $ArcheType_Matyr = $ArcheType_Matyr + 1, $Emotion_Logar = $Emotion_Logar + 1)
[[(HookBreaksEvent)]]
Sequence:
None()
passages.name: DoneIntro_Mar

passages.text:
Ahhhhhhh UNRA

[[What happened ?->AskForWhatHappenedReplyCheck]]
[[Are you alright, Logar ?->AskForWhatHappenedReplyCheck]]
[[Something is wrong ?->AskForWhatHappenedReplyCheck]]

Conditions:
Variable["Story_Timeline_RiceAndFish"] == 1 and
Variable["CurrentAction_TalkingToLogar"] == true
passages.name: (HookBreaksEvent)

passages.text:
[[(HookBreaksEvent)]]
Sequence:
None()
passages.name: DoneIntro_Neu

passages.text:
(set: $Story_Timeline_RiceAndFish = $Story_Timeline_RiceAndFish + 1)
[[(GoodMagRep)]]
[[(BadMagRep)]]
passages.name: AskForWhatHappenedReplyCheck

passages.text:
My hook broke. grrrr. UNRA.
[[(Convo_HookBreak)]]
Conditions:
Variable["Story_Variable_RiceAndFish_PissedOffLogar"]==false and
Variable["ArcheType_Magician"]>= 2
passages.name: (GoodMagRep)

passages.text:
It is none of your concern. Leave Me Alone!!.

Conditions:
Variable["Story_Variable_RiceAndFish_PissedOffLogar"]==true or
Variable["ArcheType_Magician"] < 2
passages.name: (BadMagRep)

passages.text: Double-click this passage to edit it.
passages.name: (Convo_HookBreak)

passages.text:
It happens long ago, and I have no intention to be your history teacher.
[[((WhereLogar_Names_QuestionHub_Actual))]]
passages.name: ((WhereLogar_Names_QuestionHub_Before))
